SimEntity.author: Patrick Sullivan
SimEntity.name: CivilianPleasureCraft
SimEntity.Comment: A Civilian vessel considerd to be a pleasure craft

Parameter.name: moverID
Parameter.Comment: DIS entity ID

Parameter.name: startPosition
Parameter.Comment: Start Position - different than first waypoint

Parameter.name: maximumSpeed
Parameter.Comment: Speed of this entity

Parameter.name: name
Parameter.Comment: Should match name in Assembly

Parameter.name: level
Parameter.Comment: The classifcation level of this entity (e.g. UNCLASSIFIED)

Parameter.name: rationale
Parameter.Comment: The specific element which contains the information classifying this document

Parameter.name: reference
Parameter.Comment: The published source of classified information, if any

Parameter.name: length
Parameter.Comment: The maximum length of this craft in meters

Parameter.name: width
Parameter.Comment: The maximum beam of this craft in meters

Parameter.name: height
Parameter.Comment: The maximum height of this craft in meters

Parameter.name: draft
Parameter.Comment: The maximum draft of this craft in meters

Parameter.name: centerOfGravity
Parameter.Comment: Center of Gravity of the object as an (x, y, z) distance in meters from the physical center of the object, which is located at (0, 0, 0)

Parameter.name: maximumAcceleration
Parameter.Comment: The maximum achievable acceleration

Parameter.name: maximumDeceleration
Parameter.Comment: The maximum achievable deceleration

Parameter.name: maximumTurnRate
Parameter.Comment: The maximum turn rate in degrees per second

Parameter.name: minimumTurnRadius
Parameter.Comment: The minimum turning radius for this vehicle in feet or meters

Parameter.name: maximumSurfaceDetectionRange
Parameter.Comment: The maximum detection range of the longest range surface detection sensor

Parameter.name: forceID
Parameter.Comment: The DIS Enumeration for the force id for this entity [0 = Other, 1 = Friend, 2 = Opposing, 3 = Neutral]

Parameter.name: entityDomain
Parameter.Comment: The DIS Enumeration for the domain for this entity [0 = Other, 1 = Land, 2 = Air, 3 = Surface, 4 = SubSurface]

Parameter.name: entityKind
Parameter.Comment: The DIS Enumeration for the overall type for this entity [1 = Platform, 3 = Life Form, 7 = Radio]

Parameter.name: entityCountry
Parameter.Comment: The DIS Enumeration for the country for this entity [225 = United States]

Parameter.name: zones
Parameter.Comment: Areas where this entity can navigate

StateVariable.name: visualPerception
StateVariable.Comment: Perceptual Range of Entity for Detection and Avoidance

StateVariable.name: obstacleQueue
StateVariable.Comment: Collection of obstacles for this entity to negotiate

StateVariable.name: avoidanceRange
StateVariable.Comment: Contact proximity tolerance for this entity

StateVariable.name: activeMoverManager
StateVariable.Comment: Used as a placeholder for managing various mover managers

StateVariable.name: patrolManager
StateVariable.Comment: Primary mover manager, used for moving entities from waypoint to waypoint

StateVariable.name: waypointCreator
StateVariable.Comment: generates waypoints within geometry bounds based on probabilities

StateVariable.name: interceptMoverManager
StateVariable.Comment: Mover Manager that executes an intercept

StateVariable.name: targetQueue
StateVariable.Comment: Collection of potential targets (NOTE: may not be necessary for a neutral, but left in the graph in case a modified neutral -> hostile agent is desired)

StateVariable.name: canIntercept
StateVariable.Comment: True/false return from intercept mover manager, returns false when an intercept is impossible based of the speed and range of this entity and the target

StateVariable.name: reach
StateVariable.Comment: reach is the range of the sensor that is used to determine whether there is going to be an intercept or not.

StateVariable.name: geomIndex
StateVariable.Comment: index variable used to count number of zones that are pertainent to this entity

StateVariable.name: visualRange
StateVariable.Comment: The visual range of the bridge crew on this platform

Event.name: RegisterSensor
Event.Comment: Registering of Sensor with the Scenario Manager

Event.name: Detection
ProcessZones
Event.Comment: Listens to the Harbor Creator to get Zone Assignment geometry

Argument.name: zones
Argument.Comment: Passed by the Harbor Creator - states patrol responsibilities and contains entity ID for assignment

LocalVariable.name: count
LocalVariable.Comment: tracks number of patrol zone assignments
